鷢鷢鷢

鷢字的基本解释

鷢
jué
〔白鷢〕一种鸟，即“白鹞子”。

鷢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》其月切，入月，羣。］
鸟名。

鷢字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷢； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1500第13
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?居月切，音厥。【說文】白鷢，王鴭也。【廣韻】白鷢一名鸉，善捕䑕。【爾雅·釋鳥】鸉，白鷢。【註】似鷹，尾上白。【韓愈·送文暢詩】飄然逐鷹鷢。又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?其月切，音?。義同。

考證：〔【說文】白鷢，王鵙也。〕　謹照原文鵙改鴭。〔【廣韻】鷢，一名揚鳥。〕　謹照楊鳥二字乃鸉字之譌。謹照原文改爲白鷢一名鸉。〔【爾雅·釋鳥】楊鳥，白鷢。〕　謹照原文楊鳥二字改爲鸉字。
鷢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鷢字的起名意思

暂无。

jué
〔White 鷢〕A kind of bird, namely "white harrier".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" its month cut, enter the month, group. ]
The name of the bird.
Shackle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷢; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1500 13
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Juyue cut, sound Jue. [Said the text] Bai Ying, Wang Ying also. [Guang Yun] A white pheasant, good at catching pi. 【Erya·Shiniao】The pheasant, the white pheasant. [Note] It looks like an eagle, with white on its tail. [Han Yu·Send Wen Chang Poems] Floating and chasing eagles. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Its month cut, sound?. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Said the text] Bai Xi, Wang Wei also. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text. [[Guang Yun] Yan, a bird. 〕　I would like to say that the two characters for Yang Niao are the zodiac signs of 鸉. I would like to change to a white pheasant according to the original text. 〔【Erya·Shiniao】Yang bird, white scorpion. 〕　I would like to change the word Yang Niao to the word 鸉 according to the original text.
